hello.intro: In the heart of Florida’s horse country, the World Equestrian Center in Ocala welcomes back its Spring Series for another season of high-caliber hunter and jumper competition. Across several weeks, ribrers from around the region gather to experience the venue’s exceptional facilities.
hello.transition: With the World Equestrian Center continuing to raise the bar for excellence, the Spring Series remains a cornerstone event on the Florida equestrian calendar.

stay.paragraph: Competitors and guests enjoy premium lodging just steps from the arenas. The Equestrian Hotel and The Riding Academy Hotel provide elegant on-site stays, while Ocala RV Camp Resort offers a relaxed extended-option nearby. Other nearby hotels include Springhill Suites, Holiday Inn Express, and Kilton Ocala, each within an easy drive.
list: The Equestrian Hotel – upscale hotel with spa and fine dining, 1.3 mi from venue.
The Riding Academy Hotel –  midscale botique lodging, 0.3 mi from venue.
Ocala RV Camp Resort – relaxed RV park with pool, 7.6 mi away.
Springhill Suites –  family-friendly suites with breakfast, 8.2 mi away.
Holiday Inn Express – casual hotel with pool, 7.9 mi away.
Hilton Ocala –  modern full-service hotel with restaurant, 8.8 mi away.

dine.paragraph: Dining options at and around WEC cater to every taste. On-site favorites include Stirrups Restaurant for refined dinines and Emma’s Patisserie for coffee and pastries. Beyond the venue, Darrell’s Diner and Ipanema Brazilian Steak House also stand out with local flavors, while popular spots like Romas Italian Restaurant, Marco's Pizza, and Jersey Mike’s Subs are perfect when desiring quick, satisfying mmeals.
list: Stirrups Restaurant – fine dining at WEC, 4.6*‪
Emma’s Patisserie – bakery and café within the venue, 4.6(‪
Darrell’s Diner – classic breakfast spot, 4.3•
Ipanema Brazilian Steak House – top-rated churrascaria, 4.7•
Romas Italian Restaurant – family-style Italian, 4.2•
Marco’s Pizza – Quick pizza and takeout, 4.3•
Jersey Mike’s Subs – casual sandwiches, 4.3•

essentials.paragraph: Essential stops are close at hand for competitors and visitors. Walgreens and CVS answer basic needs, while Contour Saddlery, Tack Shack, TT Distributors, and Seminole Feed Stores supply equestrian gear and feed. Publix offers convenient' produce and boutiques like Exceptional Equestrian and Ocala Breeders Feed & Supply cater to horse owners within minutes of WEC.
list: Walgreens Pharmacy – 4.8 mi from venue.
CVS Pharmacy – 8.0 mi from venue.
Contour Saddlery – tack and saddlery, 3.7 mi away.
Publix Super Market – full-service grocery, 4.9 mi away.
Tack Shack of Ocala – accountred tack and feed store, 3.9 mi away.
TT Distributors – equestrian supply store, 3.3 mi away.
Seminole Feed Stores – feed and supplies, 3.8 mi away.
Exceptional Equestrian – botique tack shop, 0.3 mi from venue.
Farriers Depot – farkier supplies, 5.3 mi away.
Ocala Breeders Feed & Supply – local feed store, 2.7 mi away.

outro: From exceptional amenities to world-class arenas, WEC Ocala continues to set the standard for equestrian sport in Florida. The Spring Series offers an atmosphere that balances competition with community, making it a highlight on every rider’s calendar.

seo.seo_title: WEC Ocala Spring 2026 | Lodging, Dining & Essentials
seo.seo_description: Plan your stay for the WEC Ocala Spring Series 2026 with top hotels, dining, and essentials near World Equestrian Center - Ocala.
